creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: dark landscape; stylized layered bluffs in blue and black cutting diagonally through R side; thin, forked waterfall under high bridge at R; figure at R walking over bridge; rolling white hills in UR; snow-covered trees at center; shoreline at L with snow-covered huts and a low bridge; horizontal bands of white clouds/fog throughout
markings: UR edge: 雷震｛Raishin｝; 広貞｛Hirosada｝
title: Snowy Landscape
